name: Doom Eternal: The Ancient Gods - Part One
name_original: Doom Eternal: The Ancient Gods - Part One
description: Your war is not over… slaying the Khan Maykr left an imbalance of power that threatens all of creation. The legions of Hell have razed the heavens, threatening to expand their control across dimensions. With the aid of an old ally, battle your way back to Urdak and decide the fate of the cosmos. Your mission is now your own.
